title: ACORUS BALANCE Slim Detox powder, 180 g - Mness aptieka
cleaned_text: - For the function of the gastrointestinal tract and digestive system - To maintain blood sugar - Liver function FIBER SLIM DETOX. Dietary supplement. With sweetener. Fiber source. - The seed coatings of egg yolk and chicory root can help maintain the normal function of the digestive system, promote the movement of food in the intestinal tract. - Chicory roots can help maintain normal liver function. - Cinnamon can help maintain normal blood sugar levels. - Sowing oats can help speed up your metabolism. - Chicory can help maintain a normal body weight. - Bitter orange peel can help control body weight and support lipid and carbohydrate metabolism.
